title: #42 Alasdair Beckett-King, Morgan Sung, Lindsay Ellis, and Gavin Purcell: Bonus follows UNLOCKED
itunes:title: Alasdair Beckett-King, Morgan Sung, Lindsay Ellis, and Gavin Purcell: Bonus follows UNLOCKED
description:
(Full transcript at https://followfridaypodcast.com/patreon-special (FollowFridayPodcast.com))
Supporters of the Follow Friday Patreon page get a shout-out on the podcast, exclusive previews of who's coming up on future episodes, and — most importantly — bonus podcasts, with follow recommendations from our amazing guests that didn't make it into the main episode.
Today on Follow Friday, we're unlocking four of those bonus episodes, which were originally available only to Patreon supporters. They feature ...
- Comedian https://followfridaypodcast.com/alasdair-beckett-king (Alasdair Beckett-King), recommending "aspiring philosopher" https://twitter.com/lastpositivist/ (Liam Bright)
- NBC News reporter https://followfridaypodcast.com/morgan-sung (Morgan Sung), recommending journalist/roller dancer https://www.instagram.com/fairyquadmuva/?hl=en (Liz Brazile)
- YouTuber and bestselling author https://followfridaypodcast.com/lindsay-ellis (Lindsay Ellis), recommending YouTuber https://www.youtube.com/c/KatBlaque/videos (Kat Blaque)
- Way Too Interested host https://followfridaypodcast.com/gavin-purcell (Gavin Purcell), recommending Glitch CEO https://twitter.com/anildash (Anil Dash)
If you've been on the fence about joining the Patreon page, then today's show will give you a good idea of what to expect. You can pledge any amount you want, starting at just $1/month, at https://www.patreon.com/followfriday (patreon.com/followfriday).
Follow us:
- Alasdair is on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/ABeckettKing/videos (@ABeckettKing) and on Twitter https://twitter.com/MisterABK (@MisterABK)
- Morgan is on Twitter https://twitter.com/morgan_sung (@morgan_sung) and on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/ratsoverflowers/ (@ratsoverflowers)
- Lindsay is on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/LindsayEllisVids (@LindsayEllisVids)
- Gavin is on Twitter https://twitter.com/gavinpurcell (@gavinpurcell)
- Follow us @followfridaypod on https://twitter.com/followfridaypod (Twitter) and https://www.instagram.com/followfridaypod/ (Instagram)
- Eric is on Twitter https://twitter.com/heyheyesj (@heyheyesj)
Theme song written by Eric Johnson, and performed by https://www.fiverr.com/yonamarie (Yona Marie). Show art by https://www.fiverr.com/dodiihr (Dodi Hermawan).
Thank you to our amazing patrons: Jon, Justin, Amy, Yoichi, Shinri, and Elizabeth
content:encoded:
(Full transcript at FollowFridayPodcast.com)

Supporters of the Follow Friday Patreon page get a shout-out on the podcast, exclusive previews of who's coming up on future episodes, and — most importantly — bonus podcasts, with follow recommendations from our amazing guests that didn't make it into the main episode.

Today on Follow Friday, we're unlocking four of those bonus episodes, which were originally available only to Patreon supporters. They feature ...

- Comedian Alasdair Beckett-King, recommending "aspiring philosopher" Liam Bright

- NBC News reporter Morgan Sung, recommending journalist/roller dancer Liz Brazile

- YouTuber and bestselling author Lindsay Ellis, recommending YouTuber Kat Blaque

- Way Too Interested host Gavin Purcell, recommending Glitch CEO Anil Dash

If you've been on the fence about joining the Patreon page, then today's show will give you a good idea of what to expect. You can pledge any amount you want, starting at just $1/month, at patreon.com/followfriday.

Follow us:

- Alasdair is on YouTube @ABeckettKing and on Twitter @MisterABK

- Morgan is on Twitter @morgan_sung and on Instagram @ratsoverflowers

- Lindsay is on YouTube @LindsayEllisVids

- Gavin is on Twitter @gavinpurcell

- Follow us @followfridaypod on Twitter and Instagram

- Eric is on Twitter @heyheyesj

Theme song written by Eric Johnson, and performed by Yona Marie. Show art by Dodi Hermawan.

Thank you to our amazing patrons: Jon, Justin, Amy, Yoichi, Shinri, and Elizabeth
dc:creator: LightningPod.fm
